title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 41.1 - Application and construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 41.1 - Application and construction

State Regulations
(a) This Part applies to all public performances and exhibitions to which section
37.09
of the Arts and Cultural Affairs Law
may apply. (b) No provision of this

Part is to be construed in derogation of the provisions of section
37.09
of the Arts and Cultural Affairs

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
41.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
